Attacks.Name: Confusion
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Jirachi gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Iron Head
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target is Pushed S before damage is dealt.

Attacks.Name: Doom Desire
Attacks.Effect: Place a Doom Marker on the target. At the end of the next round, the target suffers 3 damage and gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Serene Grace
Superpowers.Effect: Jirachi may reroll one attack die when rolling for attacks.

Superpowers.Name: Wish Maker
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from an allied character within Range 2. That character gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Star Shield
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of its next activation, Jirachi adds 2 dice to its defense rolls against mystic attacks.

Attacks.Name: Future Sight
Attacks.Effect: Place a Future Sight Marker on the target. At the end of the next round, the target suffers 4 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Wish
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from an allied character within Range 2. After using this superpower, Jirachi gains the Stagger special condition.
